channel.title: Puzzle Pirates Blige (like bejewled)
channel.description:
[URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img101.imageshack.us/img101/4382/bligesq2.png[/img][/URL] Same rules apply as bejeweled except you can only switch verticley rather than verticle/horizontal.
A script that will automaticly play the game is very appreciated.
The game runs in a java client window downloadable through the site
By the way, anyone who is a fan of puzzle games, this is the game for you.
